import React, { useState, useEffect, useContext } from 'react'; import { useForm } from "react-hook-form"; import axios from 'axios'; import { useParams } from "react-router-dom"; // import { Card, CardMedia, CardContent, CardActions, Typography, IconButton } from '@material-ui/core'; import { AddShoppingCart } from '@material-ui/icons'; import Popup from "reactjs-popup"; import Menu from '../home/Menu'; import "../products/css/Detail.css" import { Context } from '../../contexts/Context'; import CurrencyFormat from 'react-currency-format'; const DetailPro = () => { const { register, handleSubmit, formState: { errors } } = useForm(); let { id } = useParams(); const [data, setData] = useState([]); const { addCart, reduction, increase, total, getTotal } = useContext(Context) console.log(data) useEffect(() => { const fetchData = async () => { await axios("http://localhost:8080/detail/" + id) .then(result => { setData(result.data); }, (error) => { console.log(error); } ) }; fetchData(); }, []) const onSubmit = () => { console.log("data") } useEffect(() => { getTotal(); }, []) const renderData = (data) => { return (
{data.map((item, index) => { return (

); }) }
) } function NavNoti() { var items = []; for (var i = 0; i < data.length; i++) { items.push(
  1. Trang chủ
    2. »
  2. Điện thoại
    3. »
  3. {data[i].name}
) } return (
{items}
) } return ( <> {renderData(data)} ); } export default DetailPro;
